Class Atom

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.classical.mechanics.Particle
org.jscience.chemistry.Atom
public class Atom extends Particle
An atom in a molecular structure. Extends Generic Linear Algebra Particle for physical simulation.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
